sentences.sContent: His mocking smile rattled her more than his anger.
sentences.sCn: 他那种嘲讽的微笑比他的愤怒更让她慌乱。

sentences.sContent: It was hard not to get rattled when the work piled up.
sentences.sCn: 工作积了一大堆，哪能不着急呢。

sentences.sContent: His confidence was rattled by the accident.
sentences.sCn: 这场事故动摇了他的自信。
